description: [Tier 2] Analysts have raised price targets following a record quarterly revenue report, citing strong Services margins and resilient cash flow generation. (Annualized Imp. Ret: 13.54%)

[Tier 2] Despite a downgrade from DA Davidson, other analysts maintain positive ratings and have increased price targets, citing growth in AWS and core retail efficiencies. (Annualized Imp. Ret: 36.60%)
[Tier 2] Strong user growth and platform profitability underpin a compelling long-term risk/reward, despite heavy ad revenue dependence. (Annualized Imp. Ret: 33.35%)
